modName: More Real sneak attacks on humanoids
summary: The mod changes sneak attack damage multipliers to be more deadly for humanoid creatures.
descriptionHtml:
Let\'s imagine situation like that: you\'re sneaking to frail Necromancer to slit his throat. But you can\'t! Fail! And he\'s killing you. Doesn\'t sound familiar?
That mod eliminates situation of this kind. No more fail sneak attacks with daggers, sword, clubs and fists.
What this mod changes:
All weapons sneak attacks damage multipliers except bows for this:
Daggers - 255x
One-handed weapons - 102x
Two-handed weapons - 255x
Fists - 255x
Multipliers will be doubled with Dark Brotherhood gauntlets.
This mod doesn\'t increase the damage multipliers for all races.

Multipliers are increased for those races:
GiantRace X
DraugrRace X
DremoraRace
DraugrMagicRace X
ElderRace
ElderRaceVampire
HagravenRace X
RedguardRace
RedguardRaceVampire
OrcRaceVampire
OrcRace
HighElfRaceVampire
HighElfRace
WoodElfRaceVampire
WoodElfRace
DarkElfRaceVampire
DarfElfRace
BretonRaceVampire
BretonRace
KhajjitRaceVampire
KhajjitRace
ImperialRaceVampire
ImperialRace
FalmerRace X
NordRaceVampire
NordRace
NordRaceAstrid
ArgonianRaceVampire
ArgonianRace
AfflictedRace

Races marked with X doesn\'t have increased multipliers for fist attacks.

Race not mentioned haven\'t increased multipliers.

You will need perk \'Assassin\'s Blade\" to increase multipliers. No perk, no changed multipliers.

Compatibility:
This mod is NOT compatible with Path of Shadows mod.

I hope it will make The Path of Assassin will be picked more often by players.
author: Ayaz
